highlights: Codebase utiling Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
Engineer for backend team utilizing Java and Ruby on Rails
Developed backend API for developer usage
Modularized and optimized existing backend code for 30% faster load times
Developed alert system for backend issues
Engineer for backend analytics team utilizing Node.js and Express
Developed analytics application for visualizing performance of backend services
Identified and patched bottleneck in backend performance, reducing backend resource consumption by 15%
Developed plugin system for analytics application to allow easy monitoring of other systems

education.description: Masters program with a focus on verification, validation, testing, project management, security, advanced algorithms, and more. Capstone project focused on a scalable content distribution network.
Coursework included operating system design, obect-oriented programming, data structures, virtualization, application scaling, complex algorithms, and more.

projects.name: Cool Web Application
projects.description: A web application that does really cool stuff. Written in Python using Django framework. Allows a user to enter information, then stores that information in an SQL database.

projects.name: Cool Mobile Application
projects.description: A mobile application that does really cool stuff. Written in Swift for iOS. Allows a user to enter information, which is synced using CoreData across devices.
